description:
Department: Endorse Infinity

Location: Los Angeles, CA

Compensation: $21.50 - $31.00 / hour

Description

About Endorse Infinity:

At Endorse Infinity, we're not just a social media marketing company; we're your partners in digital success. With a passion for innovation and a commitment to excellence, we've been helping businesses of all sizes navigate the ever-evolving landscape of social media since our inception.

Job Description: Endorse Infinity is seeking a talented and creative Social Media Assistant to join our dynamic team. As a Social Media Assistant, you will be responsible for managing the social media presence of our clients, developing engaging content, and implementing effective strategies to drive audience growth and engagement across various platforms.

Position Type: Full-time

Salary: $21.50 - $31.00 hourly

Key Responsibilities

  • Assist in the development and implementation of social media strategies
  • Create, schedule, and publish engaging content on social media platforms including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn
  • Monitor and respond to comments and messages on social media platforms in a timely manner
  • Conduct research on industry trends and competitor social media activities
  • Generate monthly reports on social media performance using analytics tools
  • Collaborate with the marketing team to plan and execute social media campaigns
  • Stay up-to-date with social media best practices and emerging trends

Skills, Knowledge And Expertise

  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Strong understanding of social media analytics and reporting
  • Proficiency in social media management tools such as Hootsuite or Buffer
  • Creative thinking and ability to generate engaging content
  • Knowledge of current social media trends and best practices

Benefits

  • Health insurance coverage
  • Retirement savings plan (401k)
  • Paid time off and holidays
  • Professional development opportunities
  • Employee discounts on company products or services
